FontsValueExamplesUsage
fontFamilyBody'Salesforce Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif
Aa
font-face should be 'Salesforce Sans'.

Media QueriesValueExamplesUsage
mqSmallonly screen and (min-width: 28em)448px, for phone devices and larger.
mqMediumonly screen and (min-width: 48em)768px, for phone devices and larger.
mqLargeonly screen and (min-width: 64em)1024px, for tablet devices and larger.
mqXLargeonly screen and (min-width: 80em)1280px, for desktop screens and larger.
